TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits2 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a totalDigits-2.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a unsignedByte restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 2.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte totalDigits-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-totalDigits-2 element, sets the values: 0, 9, 10, 11, 20, 99 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte totalDigits-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-totalDigits-2 element, sets the values: 100, 101, 255, 400, -1, -10, -400 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte totalDigits-2.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-totalDigits-2 type, sets the values: 0, 9, 10, 11, 20, 99 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte totalDigits-2.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-totalDigits-2 type, sets the values: 100, 101, 255, 400, -1, -10, -400 and expects validation to fail.
